api_list.api_description: Get a fact about a number from the Numbers API.

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: An integer, 'random', or day of year 'month/day'.

optional_parameters.name: fragment
optional_parameters.description: Return the fact as a sentence fragment.

optional_parameters.name: min_val
optional_parameters.description: The minimum value for random facts.

optional_parameters.name: max_val
optional_parameters.description: The maximum value for random facts.

optional_parameters.name: json
optional_parameters.description: Return the fact in JSON format.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve sunrise and sunset times for a specific location based on latitude and longitude.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude of the location in decimal degrees.

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: Longitude of the location in decimal degrees.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format or relative formats such as 'today'. Defaults to today.

optional_parameters.name: timezone
optional_parameters.description: Timezone of the returned times. Defaults to the location's timezone.

optional_parameters.name: date_start
optional_parameters.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format for retrieving a range.

optional_parameters.name: date_end
optional_parameters.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format for retrieving a range.

query: Can you find a historical fact about the year 1969, and also provide the sunrise and sunset times on the same date in Washington, D.C.?
